name: corresponding
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: similar to, connected with, or caused by something else

example.eg: Company losses were 50 percent worse than in the corresponding period last year.
example.egtrans: 与去年同期相比，公司亏损增加了50%。

example.eg: As the course becomes more difficult, there's usually a corresponding drop in attendance.
example.egtrans: 随着课程逐渐变难，来上课的人也越来越少了。
